trans-unit.source: This is an Allday-Event (Time is ignored)
Target Audience
This will mark the event as cancelled. This flag is automatically set by cronjob. The cronjob sents a cancellation email to all subscribers.
Select one ore more categories. At least one category is requried. This can be used to filter events in frontend plugins.
Select the contact person. The corresponding email address will be used to send the confirmation email. Only one person may be checked.
Description of Event
Select one ore more discipline. This can be used to filter events in frontend plugins.
End of Event
You may select the duration of your event relative to start. This select box will be removed after saving the event.
Select one location where the event takes place. This location is set in the ics-invitation.
Set maximum number of subscribers. If this value is reached, the subscription will be closed and the contact person will be informed.Remove this value to disable subscription.

Set minimum number of subscribers. If this value is not reached up to the given subscription end time, the event will be cancelled. All subscribers and the contact person will be informed. Remove this value to disable subscription.
Enter a full URI (http://...) to an online survey.
Start of Event (Date and Time)
End of Subscription. Up to this date and time the subscription is possible. Leafe time empty or 0:00 to stop subscription _before_ the given day.
This option is checked automatically after the information mail was sent. To resent the mail on next cronjob run, remove the flag. If you do not want a notification, check this option.
Please enter the day and time the subscription period ends. If this value is empty, a selectbox is shown with values relative to the start time.
You may select a time the subscription period will end relative to the start of the event. This select box will be removed after saving the event.
You may enter subscribers manually. Don't forget to save the event afterwards!
Teaser text
Title
